title: Nanophotonics - HervÃ© Rigneault et al.
description:
Nanophotonics - HervÃ© Rigneault et al. (ISTE, 2006).pdf

Nanophotonics is a comprehensive introduction to the emerging area concerned with controlling and shaping optical fields at a subwavelength scale. Photonic crystals and microcavities are extensively described, including non-linear optical effects.
Local-probe techniques are presented and are used to characterize plasmonic devices. The emerging fields of semiconductor nanocrystals and nanobiophotonics are also presented
